Header: One dead and two missing in Mt. Lavinia
Content: One has died after drowning in the Sea at Mt. Lavinia while two others have gone missing. The Police reports that the dead is a 21 year old resident of Maskeliya. Two missing are reported to be an 18 year old from Lindula, Hatton and 21 year old from Jampatawidiya, Colombo. The victims have come to sea-bathe in Mt. Lavinia with nine young men last evening.
